S0435: Yes they could if they wanted to.
S0436: No hay un número mínimo que necesitan.
No there's a minimum number they need.
S0437: Querían recaudar tanto como posible para caridad.
They wanted to raise as much as possible for charity.
S0438: No querían decidir lo que debería hacer.
They didn't want to decide what he should do.
S0440: Quieren viajar mientras todavía son jóvenes.
They want to travel while they're still young.
S0442: Did they want to develop a new approach?
S0443: No querían continuar haciéndolo de la misma manera.
No they wanted to keep doing it the same way.
S0444: Sí pensaban que podría hacerse más eficientemente.
Yes they thought it could be done more efficiently.
